page.title: 04ETON WICK C.E. COMB. SCHOOL
page.content:
This was founded in 1888.It now takes pupils from 5_12 years.The old Victorian building is now the canteen and new teaching blocks have been added as well as a hall, pottery & craft room, science room, cookery room, pavillion, swimming pool & gardens.
There is a wide curriculem, extracurricula activities & use of technology with videos, calculators and computers. The school has a dual role in the village as a centre for education and a meeting place for social events. Held yearly ;{May & Christmas Fayres, {Sports Events, Summer Musical and {Christmas Concerts.
